select id, name, ifnull(substring(simplify_context, locate(#{param.name}, simplify_context), 100), '') substr_context, (select name from daily_interview_title dit where dit.id=di.title_id) title from daily_interview di
and (name like concat('%', #{param.name}, '%') or simplify_context like concat('%', #{param.name}, '%'))
and (title_id=#{param.titleId} or title_id in (select id from daily_interview_title where parent_id=#{param.titleId}))
and title_id=#{param.subTitleId}
order by sort desc, id asc
